name: Kishōtenketsu (Pixel Brownie Software)
description:
Over the course of a month, you will meet 6 characters in different areas on differing days. You respond to them, and they will respond to back to you in an emotionally significant way.

At the end of the month, each character will tell you how they feel about you.

This game features a personality model originally designed by Chris Crawford. 

http://www.erasmatazz.com/library/course-description-2018/numbers.html
http://www.erasmatazz.com/library/course-description-2018/using-bnumber-math.html
http://www.erasmatazz.com/library/course-description-2018/a-more-artistic-example.html
